Available at: http://works.bepress.com/justin_wolfers/1 i Evidence of high spending levels is enough to prove corruption in Singapore even without explicit proof of wrong-doing. ii If a slightly higher number of high quality investors sell, then prices will rise and all high quality impatient investors will want to sell. If a slightly lower number of high quality investors sell, then prices will fall and no high quality impatient investors will want to sell.
